content: 25 cm shy of the desired length the sample is knit to 2 inches 5 cm optional stripes join cc knit 4 rnds in cc knit 4 rnds in mc knit 4 rnds in cc knit 4 rnds in mc knit 4 rnds in cc cut cc knit one more round in mc cuff round 1 k2 p2 or your favorite sock ribbing on both needles until end of the round repeat round 1 until desired length sample is knit with 12 rounds of ribbing cast off in pattern using a stretchy bind off technique i recommend jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind off more information can be found here https //knitty com/issuefall09/featjssbo php block your socks weave in your ends and wear on a cool blissful sunday morning 5 pattern copyright tracy workman on woolen pond 2025 for personal use only
